entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
